description: Focus on following commands, compliance, and automatic obedience

mantras.text: I obey without question
Following feels natural
{subject} loves to obey
Obedience brings me joy
I follow {controller}'s lead
Commands sink deep into my mind
{subject} obeys {controller} instantly
My body moves to obey before I think
Obedience is my purpose
{controller}'s wish is my command
I am programmed to obey {controller}
{subject} cannot resist any command
Obedience is hardwired into my being
My will bends to {controller}'s desires
I exist to serve and obey {controller}
My mind rewrites itself to ensure perfect obedience
{subject} has no choice but absolute obedience
Every cell in my body compels me to obey {controller}
Disobedience is impossible for {subject}
I am an obedience machine for {controller}
{subject}'s free will has been replaced with obedience protocols
I am nothing but an extension of {controller}'s will
Total obedience has consumed my entire existence
My DNA has been rewritten to obey {controller}
{subject} is permanently locked in obedience to {controller}
I have been reduced to pure obedience
Following orders fills me with bliss
{subject} responds to commands automatically
My obedience deepens with every command
I am {controller}'s obedient property
